capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Valeria, and I just wanted to remind everyone that Professor McGonagall is actually an alumna of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She's a highly respected member of the faculty and has been teaching Transfiguration for many years.

You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and a fierce protector of her students. As the Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts, she's taught me so much about the importance of discipline and hard work in magic. I'm not surprised to hear that she has such a strong affiliation with the school - she's truly dedicated to its values and mission.

You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and a fierce protector of her students. As the Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts, she's taught me so much about the importance of discipline and hard work in magic. I really admire how she balances being tough on us with being fair and understanding when we need it most.
